Description: Pottery ostracon containing five lines of text; four lines of a literary text written in Coptic are followed by an alphabet in the fifth line.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390749) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390749)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 520 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
